attributes.action: allow Guy Fawkes night to go ahead in Glasgow on 5th November
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The annual fireworks display at Glasgow green has been posponed until 6th November due to a game of football being played. It's terrible that an annual traditional British event has been moved to acccmmodate a game of football. I propose that it goes ahead on the proper night

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
